eu.linksmart.qos
Interface QoSManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface QoSManager
extends java.rmi.Remote

The interface for the Quality-of-Service Component.

Provides functionalities for retrieving best-suitable services by computing a ranking list while taking into consideration a set of mean requirements (more, less) and optionally a single extreme requirement (most, least) for device/service properties.

Author:
Amro Al-Akkad

Method Detail

getRankingList

java.lang.String getRankingList(java.lang.String xmlString)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method expects a XML string as input and returns a XML string as output as well.

Parameters:
xmlString - this string must represent an XML document, for instance qos:playsvideo avi Resolution most Colors more Screensize more PowerConsumption less
Returns:
this will return an xml string, for instance 1 playVideo1 playVideo1HID 5 75%
Resolution 1024*768 pixels 90% ScreenSize 34 inches 40% PowerConsumption 56 watts 100% Colors 256 dots 70%
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

see similar to get ranking list for input and output. Optimally this method reuses getRankingList method.

Parameters:
xmlString - this string must represent an XML document
Returns:
will return a XML
Throws:

getQoSProperties

java.lang.String getQoSProperties(java.lang.String query)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Retrieves specific QoS properties from LinkSmart ontology

Parameters:

Returns:
the result of querying ontology.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
